welcome.title: Send, Receive & Manage your {protocol} tokens
welcome.body: Firefly is the official wallet software for {protocol}.

legal.title: Privacy Policy & Terms of Service
legal.body: Please review the Privacy Policy and Terms of Service.
legal.checkbox: I've read and I accept the Privacy Policy and Terms of Service

chooseProtocol.title: Choose protocol
chooseProtocol.body: Set the protocol for your profile.

chooseNetwork.title: Choose network
chooseNetwork.body: Set the network for your profile.

private-net.title: Private net
private-net.body: Support for custom networks with active TIPs

private-net.title: Private net
private-net.body: Support for custom networks with draft TIPs

setupPrivateNetworkConnection.title: Connect to a private network
setupPrivateNetworkConnection.body: Fill the form with the node information and connect to a private network.

setup.title: Set up {protocol, select, IOTA {an} Shimmer {a}} {protocol} profile
setup.body: Select the appropriate method to set up your {protocol} profile.

setupNew.title: Create a profile
setupNew.body: You can choose a regular software wallet, or if you have a Ledger device, you can set up a hardware wallet.

softwareAccount.title: Create a software profile
softwareAccount.description: Provides a Stronghold file and recovery phrase

ledgerAccount.title: Create a hardware profile
ledgerAccount.description: Ledger Nano S or Nano X required

setupRecovered.title: Recover {protocol} profile
setupRecovered.body: If you have an existing mnemonic or Stronghold backup file, you can import it here.
setupRecovered.importLedgerDescription: Restore from your Ledger Nano S or X device

setupClaimed.title: Claim Shimmer staking rewards
setupClaimed.body: Import your IOTA profile and claim your Shimmer staking rewards.

enterName.title: Create your {protocol} profile
enterName.body1: You can create multiple user profiles to organise your wallets and improve privacy.

body2.first: For now, let's start with your first profile name.
body2.nonFirst: For now, let's start with your profile name.

enterName.addMore: You can add more profiles later.

setupStrongholdPassword.title: Create a password
setupStrongholdPassword.body1: You need a strong password to protect your funds. Use a combination of words, and avoid common phrases, names or dates.
setupStrongholdPassword.body2: It is recommended that you write down your password in your Recovery Kit.

setupPinProtection.title: Set up PIN code
setupPinProtection.body1: Enter a 6-digit PIN below. You will be asked for your PIN to access your profile.

backupMnemonic.title: Back up your recovery phrase
backupMnemonic.body1: You will now be shown a recovery phrase. Write it down in your Recovery Kit.
backupMnemonic.body2: Do not share your recovery phrase with anyone. It can be used to access your tokens from anywhere.
backupMnemonic.body3: If you lose your recovery phrase, you may lose your funds.

viewMnemonic.title: Recovery phrase
viewMnemonic.body1: In your Recovery Kit, write down the words in the exact order shown.
viewMnemonic.body2: Keep this private and safely stored.
viewMnemonic.body3: It is important to have a written backup. Computers often fail and files can corrupt.

verifyMnemonic.title: Verify recovery phrase
verifyMnemonic.body: Let's check you wrote down the phrase correctly. Please select each word in numbered order. Tip: You can press the number next to the word in your keyboard to select it.
verifyMnemonic.verifiedBody: Remember to keep it private and safely stored.

backupStronghold.title: Back up to a Stronghold file
backupStronghold.body1: Enter your password to create a Stronghold backup of your profile. Your password is used to encrypt the backup file.
backupStronghold.body2: Reasons why digital backups are important:
backupStronghold.reason1: Easily recover your wallets without typing in your recovery phrase
backupStronghold.reason2: Import your wallets on other devices

importMnemonicPhrase.title: Enter your recovery phrase
importMnemonicPhrase.body: A recovery phrase is 24 words long, all lower case, with spaces between. This is used to recover existing Firefly profiles.

importStrongholdBackup.title: Import your Stronghold backup
importStrongholdBackup.body: Import a Stronghold backup file to restore your profile.

backupPassword.body2: This is the password you set when you first created your backup.

success.title: You have successfully recovered your backup
success.body: You can now set up your new profile.

claimRewards.title: Your Shimmer staking rewards
claimRewards.body: Check that your Shimmer staking rewards are correct. You may need to search multiple times to find your full balance.

success.title: Shimmer claimed
success.body: You have successfully claimed your Shimmer tokens.

congratulations.title: Profile setup almost complete...
congratulations.body: Your new profile will be ready once the dashboard has successfully loaded.
congratulations.ledgerHint: Do not disconnect your Ledger device until the dashboard has finished loading.
congratulations.softwareMigratedBody: You have successfully migrated your funds to the new network
congratulations.fireflyLedgerBody: Your Ledger profile was successfully recovered and you can now continue.
congratulations.trinityLedgerBody: You have successfully migrated your Ledger to the new network.
congratulations.exportMigration: Export migration log and finish setup

setupLedger.videoGuide: Guia em vídeo para migração da Ledger

ledgerInstallationGuide.title: Have you installed the {protocol} app on your Ledger device?
ledgerInstallationGuide.body1: Before you proceed, you must use Ledger Live to find and install the {protocol} app.
ledgerInstallationGuide.body2: Certifique-se de que o firmware da sua Ledger esteja atualizado. Todo Las as aplicações pré-instaladas devem ser atualizados para a sua versão mais recente.

importFromLedger.title: Restaurar ou migrar o seu Ledger
importFromLedger.body: Restaure um perfil Ledger existente da Firefly, ou migre os seus fundos da Trinity.
importFromLedger.haveFireflyLedger: Eu tenho um backup Ledger da Firefly
importFromLedger.haveTrinityLedger: Tenho um backup Ledger da Trinity

connectLedger.title: Conecte a sua Ledger à Firefly
connectLedger.body: Para que o seu dispositivo Ledger seja encontrado pela Firefly, certifique-se de que o aplicativo oficial Ledger Live esteja fechado.
connectLedger.unlock: Unlock your Ledger with its pin
connectLedger.openApp: Open the Shimmer app on your Ledger
connectLedger.tips: Dicas caso a sua Ledger não esteja a conectar

restoreFromFireflyLedger.title: Restaurar o seu perfil Ledger
restoreFromFireflyLedger.body: Press restore to complete the setup process and restore your wallets, balances and transaction history.

legacyLedgerIntro.title: Start your Ledger migration using Firefly
legacyLedgerIntro.body1: Firefly will help you to transfer your tokens to the new Chrysalis network.
legacyLedgerIntro.body2: After the migration, you will be able to send and receive your tokens using your Ledger with Firefly.
legacyLedgerIntro.readMore: What to expect from the migration process

generateNewLedgerAddress.title: Generate new address
generateNewLedgerAddress.body: You need to generate a new address to migrate your tokens with Firefly. Click the button below to continue.
generateNewLedgerAddress.confirmBody: For security, please compare the address generated on your Ledger device with the one displayed below. If they match, press both buttons on your Ledger as prompted.
generateNewLedgerAddress.confirmedBody: You have confirmed that the address in Firefly matches the one on your Ledger device.

switchLedgerApps.title: Switch Ledger apps
switchLedgerApps.body: Please switch to the {legacy} app on your Ledger device to continue migration. When ready, press continue.

selectLedgerAccountIndex.title: Choose Ledger account index
selectLedgerAccountIndex.body: Choose the Ledger account index you used with Trinity. For most users this will be the default index of 0.
selectLedgerAccountIndex.reinstallLegacy: If not, disconnect the device and try again. If the issue persists, you may need to reinstall the {legacy} app.

general.title: General
general.description: Configure your app's appearance and other general settings

security.title: Segurança
security.description: Altere a sua palavra-passe e ajuste as configurações relacionadas à segurança

advanced.title: Advanced
advanced.description: Tools and manual settings for technical users

helpAndInfo.title: Ajuda & Informação
helpAndInfo.description: Encontre a resposta para uma pergunta ou obtenha ajuda num problema

profile.title: Perfil
profile.description: Altere o nome do seu perfil ou defina um avatar

theme.title: Tema
theme.advice: If you change your system theme, you may need to restart Firefly to see the effects

currency.title: Moeda
currency.description: Ajusta as opções de conversão e atualiza as opções do gráfico

notifications.title: Notificações
notifications.description: Notificações do sistema para eventos de transações

networkStatus.title: Estado da rede
networkStatus.description: Displays the status of the node you are currently connected to

exportStronghold.title: Export backup
exportStronghold.description: Exportar arquivo Stronghold - um backup completo encriptado da sua carteira e do histórico recente de transações

appLock.title: Automatic lock
appLock.description: Tempo de inatividade antes do bloqueio das suas carteiras e encerra a sessão

changePassword.title: Alterar Palavra-Passe
changePassword.description: A sua palavra-passe é usada para proteger a sua carteira. Deve usar uma palavra-passe forte para proteger os seus fundos

changePincode.title: Alterar código PIN
changePincode.description: O seu PIN mantém o seu saldo e suas transações privadas

walletFinder.title: Wallet finder
walletFinder.description: Perform an extended search of your previously used wallets

hiddenAccounts.title: Carteiras ocultas
hiddenAccounts.description: Ao selecionar estas opções, mostrará as carteiras que estavam ocultas, anteriormente

deleteProfile.title: Excluir perfil
deleteProfile.description: Exclui o seu perfil inteiro, carteiras e histórico de transações. Certifique-se que possui um backup

deepLinks.title: Deep links
deepLinks.description: Automatically fill transaction data in Firefly upon clicking a deep link starting with {appProtocol}://

networkConfiguration.title: Network config

description.dev: Your network settings will update automatically according to the current node configuration (switching networks will result in resetting the wallet state)
description.nonDev: Your network settings will update automatically according to the current node configuration

networkConfiguration.resetWallet: Your wallet state has been reset.

nodeConfiguration.title: Node selection
nodeConfiguration.description: Select "Manual" to configure node settings and connect to your own node(s)

configureNodeList.title: Node configuration
configureNodeList.description: Manage the list of nodes you connect to
configureNodeList.includeOfficialNodeList: Incluir a lista de servidores oficiais
configureNodeList.noNodes: There are no nodes, unable to connect to the network
configureNodeList.noNodesAuto: There are no nodes, automatic selection will be used instead

proofOfWork.title: Prova de Trabalho
proofOfWork.description: Complete a prova de trabalho localmente no seu dispositivo ou terceirize para um servidor

errorLog.title: Registo de erro
errorLog.description: Ver erros para depurar um problema

crashReporting.title: Crash reports
crashReporting.body: Help the developers improve Firefly by automatically sending diagnostic data when an error or crash occurs
crashReporting.advice: Please restart the Firefly application to {sendCrashReports, select, true {start sharing crash reports} false {stop sharing crash reports} other {apply this change}}

diagnostics.title: Diagnósticos
diagnostics.description: Exibir informações do sistema e aplicação

troubleshoot.title: Resolução de Problemas
troubleshoot.description: Use o assistente de solução de problemas para resolver problemas comuns

documentation.title: Documentação
documentation.description: Veja a documentação para explicações aprofundadas sobre como as coisas funcionam

faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Veja as FAQs para obter ajuda sobre um problema ou pergunta comum

discord.title: Discord
discord.description: Obtenha ajuda da comunidade IOTA no Discord

reportAnIssue.title: Reportar um problema
reportAnIssue.description: Reporte um erro para os desenvolvedores. Verifique se o mesmo ainda não foi reportado

login.pleaseWait: Please wait {time, plural, one {# second} other {# seconds}}
login.incorrectAttempts: {attempts, plural, one {# incorrect attempt} other {# incorrect attempts}}

statuses.appNotOpen: Ledger unlocked but app not open

bodies.upcoming: Stake your {token} tokens to automatically receive rewards every 10 seconds once staking starts on {date}.
bodies.commencing: Stake your {token} tokens to automatically receive rewards every 10 seconds once staking starts on {date}.
bodies.holdingAndStaking: You automatically receive rewards every 10 seconds.
bodies.holdingAndNotStaking: Stake your {token} tokens to receive rewards every 10 seconds.
bodies.endedAndDidStake: {token} rewards will be distributed to your wallet once the network launches.
bodies.endedAndDidNotStake: You did not participate in this airdrop.
bodies.endedAndDidNotReachMinRewards: You did not stake enough {token} tokens to reach the minimum airdrop rewards.
bodies.inactive: Open network configuration in the advanced settings and make sure the current node has the "Participation" feature by clicking "View info".

assembly.name: Assembly
assembly.description: Assembly is a permissionless, highly scalable multi-chain network to build and deploy composable smart contracts. Assembly is the future of web3.

shimmer.name: Shimmer
shimmer.description: The incentivized staging network to advance major innovations on IOTA. Whatever happens, happens. How Shimmer evolves is up to you.

enableLedgerBlindSigning.title: Enable Blind Signing
enableLedgerBlindSigning.info: In order to confirm this transaction you need to enable Blind Signing on your ledger device.
enableLedgerBlindSigning.step_1: Connect and unlock your Ledger Device
enableLedgerBlindSigning.step_3: Press the right button to navigate to Settings. Then press both buttons to validate. Your Ledger device displays Blind Signing.
enableLedgerBlindSigning.step_4: Press both buttons to enable transaction blind signing. The device displays Enabled. You're done.

pendingTransactions.title: Locked in pending transactions
pendingTransactions.subtitle: For sending native assets and small IOTA amounts

password.title: Palavra-passe requerida
password.subtitle: Please provide your password to unlock your wallets
password.backup: Por favor, insira a sua palavra-passe para exportar um backup

version.title: Versão atual: {version}
version.upToDateDescription: Está a usar a versão mais recente e mais segura da Firefly.
version.noAutoUpdate: A atualização automática está desativada nesta versão do Windows, por favor, acesse https://firefly.iota.org para fazer o download da atualização.
version.preReleaseDescription: You are running a pre-release version of Firefly. Updates are disabled.

backupStronghold.title: Backup your stronghold file
backupStronghold.body: It is important to back up your wallet regularly to ensure you have a copy of your wallets and transaction history. If you lose your backup and recovery phrase you will lose access to your funds.

deeplinkAccountSwitch.title: Select a wallet
deeplinkAccountSwitch.body: You just followed a deep link. Please select the wallet with which you want to continue.

deeplinkError.title: Failed link
deeplinkError.body: This link failed or is invalid. Please try again or double check the source of the link.

deleteAccount.title: Excluir {name}?
deleteAccount.body: Esta carteira não tem histórico de transações. Ela pode ser excluída com segurança.
deleteAccount.typePassword: Insira a palavra-passe da carteira para confirmar.
deleteAccount.errorBody1: Não é possível eliminar esta carteira, você deve ter pelo menos uma.

hideAccount.title: Ocultar {name}?
hideAccount.body: Pode encontrar esta carteira mais tarde possibilitando "Mostrar carteiras ocultas" em Configurações Avançadas.
hideAccount.typePassword: Insira a palavra-passe da carteira para confirmar.
hideAccount.errorBody1: Para ocultar uma carteira, ela deve ter saldo 0.
hideAccount.errorBody2: O saldo desta carteira é {balance}. Por favor, mova estes fundos para uma carteira diferente e tente novamente.
hideAccount.errorBody3: Não pode ocultar essa carteira, deve ter pelo menos uma.

excludeNode.title: Exclude node
excludeNode.body: Are you sure you want to exclude {url} from the available node pool?

unsetAsPrimaryNode.title: Clear primary node
unsetAsPrimaryNode.body: Are you sure you want to clear {url} as the primary node?

node.removeConfirmation: Tem certeza que deseja remover este servidor?

switchNetwork.title: Switch network
switchNetwork.resetWarning: Changing networks will log you out and reset all accounts, balances, and transaction history for this profile.
switchNetwork.typePassword: Type your password to switch to:

errorLog.title: Relatório de Erros
errorLog.empty: O relatório de erros está vazio.

deleteProfile.title: Delete profile
deleteProfile.confirmation: Tem certeza de que deseja excluir este perfil? Esta ação não pode ser desfeita.
deleteProfile.typePassword: Digite a sua palavra-passe para confirmar.

transaction.title: Confirmar transação
transaction.surplusIncluded: This transaction contains a surplus amount. Please double check this is the amount you want to send.
transaction.sendingFromStakedAccount: You are sending a transfer from a wallet that is currently being staked. This may unstake your tokens. Feel free to send the transfer but you may need to restake your remaining tokens afterwards.
transaction.sendingFromStakedAccountBelowMinReward: You are sending a transfer from a wallet that has not yet reached the minimum staking rewards. This may unstake your tokens and you may lose your staking rewards on this wallet.

walletFinder.title: Wallet finder
walletFinder.body: Perform a more exhaustive search of addresses to find missing balances and wallets.
walletFinder.searchAgainHint: Is your balance or number of wallets incorrect? Search again until your full balance is shown.

riskFunds.title: Aviso: fundos em risco durante a migração
riskFunds.body1: É altamente recomendável que proteja em segurança todos os seus fundos antes de prosseguir com a migração. Os seus fundos estão em risco de furto caso não os proteja em segurança.
riskFunds.body2: É recomendável que execute novamente o processo para endereços com um nível de risco médio ou superior.

missingBundle.title: Aviso: fundos em risco durante a migração
missingBundle.body: Tem fundos em endereços usados, mas a informação necessária para protegê-los não foi encontrada. Isso pode acontecer se você fez transações há muito tempo. Pode continuar, mas {value} está em risco durante a migração.

snapshot.title: Atualização da rede em progresso
snapshot.body: A atualização da rede Chrysalis começou.
snapshot.bodyMigration: A migração está desativada até que esteja completa.
snapshot.bodyFirefly: A Firefly está desativada até estar completa. A migração de tokens ainda será possível posteriormente.

ledgerNotConnected.title: Connect your Ledger
ledgerNotConnected.notConnected: Connect your Ledger device to continue.
ledgerNotConnected.locked: Unlock your Ledger device to continue.
ledgerNotConnected.appNotOpen: Open the {protocol} app on your Ledger device to continue.

ledgerConfirmation.confirm: To proceed, confirm the prompt displayed on your Ledger device

steps.0: Install and open the Ledger Live application
steps.1: Ensure that your Ledger is connected
steps.2: Search for the {legacy} app. You may need to enable Ledger Live developer mode.
steps.4: Remember that it's important to close Ledger Live before returning to Firefly

ledgerConnectionGuide.title: Tips if your Ledger isn’t connecting

steps.0: Make sure Ledger Live is not open on your computer
steps.1: Ensure you have unlocked your Ledger device with your PIN
steps.2: Open the new IOTA app on your Ledger device

3.link: Try the official Ledger support page

verifyLedgerTransaction.title: Verify transaction
verifyLedgerTransaction.info: Compare and confirm the transaction information displayed on your ledger device against the information below.

verifyInternalLedgerTransaction.title: Verify internal transaction
verifyInternalLedgerTransaction.info: Please confirm the internal transaction on your ledger.
verifyInternalLedgerTransaction.hint: All assets will remain on your wallet when sending an internal transaction.

ledgerAddress.title: Confirm receive address
ledgerAddress.body: Confirm that the receive address displayed on your Ledger matches the one displayed below. If they match, press both buttons on your Ledger as prompted.

ledgerMigrateIndex.title: Do you need to migrate another Trinity account index?
ledgerMigrateIndex.body: You can also migrate later in Advanced Settings.

exportTransactionHistory.title: Export transaction history
exportTransactionHistory.body: Export the transaction history for the selected wallet. The exported file will be in .csv format.
exportTransactionHistory.typePassword: Type your password to allow exporting

stakingManager.title: Staking Management
stakingManager.description: When you stake a wallet, you send a transaction to yourself marking those funds as "staked". You can transfer the tokens at any time, but you won’t continue receiving staking rewards.
stakingManager.stakedSuccessfully: Your funds have been staked for {account}.
stakingManager.unstakedSuccessfully: Your funds have been unstaked for {account}.
stakingManager.singleAccountHint: Looking for your wallets? Firefly has changed. Toggle between your wallets in the top menu bar.

stakingConfirmation.title: Confirm Participation
stakingConfirmation.multiAirdropWarning: If you do not want to participate in both airdrops, you can opt-out below. You can unstake and restake to opt back in at any time.
stakingConfirmation.mergeStakeWarning: Your funds will be staked for {airdrop}. To change which airdrops you want to participate in, unstake this wallet and stake it again.

newStakingPeriodNotification.title: Staking phase {periodNumber} from {date}
newStakingPeriodNotification.body: IOTA staking for Assembly continues... Participate in phase {periodNumber} for 90 days. Stake your IOTA tokens and earn ASMB rewards!
newStakingPeriodNotification.info: Shimmer staking is now complete and only ASMB tokens will be distributed.

shimmer-info.title: About Shimmer
shimmer-info.body1: Congratulations you have earned SMR tokens as a staking reward. Shimmer is an incentivized staging network to test major upgrades on IOTA.
shimmer-info.body2: We aim to launch Shimmer in 2022. Your tokens will become available to transfer once the network launches.

assembly-info.title: About Assembly
assembly-info.body1: Congratulations you have earned ASMB tokens as a staking reward. Assembly is a multi-chain network for deploying scalable smart contracts on IOTA.
assembly-info.body2: We aim to launch Assembly in 2022. Your tokens will become available to transfer once the network launches.

confirmDeveloperProfile.title: You are creating a developer profile
confirmDeveloperProfile.body: You will be connected to the Chrysalis Devnet by default, and can switch networks manually. Only continue if you know what you are doing.

crashReporting.title: Crash reporting
crashReporting.body: Help the developers improve Firefly by automatically sending diagnostic data when an error or crash occurs. If selected, this will take effect after restarting Firefly.
crashReporting.checkbox: Send crash reports to the IOTA Foundation

legalUpdate.tosAndPrivPolicyBody: We have updated Firefly's Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
legalUpdate.tosBody: We have updated Firefly's Terms of Service.
legalUpdate.privPolicyBody: We have updated Firefly's Privacy Policy.
legalUpdate.tosAndPrivPolicyCheckbox: I've read and I accept the updated Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
legalUpdate.tosCheckbox: I've read and I accept the updated Terms of Service
legalUpdate.privPolicyCheckbox: I've read and I accept the updated Privacy Policy

singleAccountGuide.title: The way you use Firefly has changed
singleAccountGuide.body: The content of each tab is now in the context of a single wallet. You can change the selected wallet from anywhere by using the switcher in the title bar.
singleAccountGuide.hint: Can't find a wallet? Use the balance finder in the settings to discover previously used wallets.

tokenInformation.verificationWarning: This token is unverified. Compare the token metadata against the relevant team’s official website. Only verify tokens that you trust.

faucetRequest.title: Faucet request
faucetRequest.body: Are you sure you want to request {token} tokens from the {network} faucet?

confirmRejection.title: Reject transaction
confirmRejection.description: Are you sure you want to reject this transaction?
confirmRejection.node: Please note that rejecting a transaction only hides it from your Activity feed

restoreWalletDescription.iota: Migrate to Chrysalis or restore an existing wallet

actions.createWalletDescription: Create a fresh profile running on {protocol, select, iota {Chrysalis} shimmer {Shimmer}}
actions.claimShimmerDescription: Import IOTA profile and claim staking rewards
actions.iveWrittenRecoveryPhrase: Eu anotei a minha frase de recuperação
actions.downloadRecoveryKit: Guardar o modelo Kit de Recuperação

general.scanQrOrPaste: Faça scan de um código QR ou insira um endereço
general.noAccounts: Não possui carteiras, por favor crie uma.
general.firstSync: A sincronizar histórico, pode demorar um pouco...
general.creatingAccount: A criar carteira, por favor aguarde...
general.updatingAccount: A atualizar carteira, por favor aguarde...
general.pinCodeFailed: Falha ao atualizar o código PIN
general.creatingProfile: A criar perfil, por favor aguarde...
general.accountRemoved: Esta carteira está oculta. Exibi-a para realizar transferências.
general.availableBalanceTooltip: An asset's total balance minus any funds that are required to cover the storage deposit (i.e. funds that are locked in pending transactions, reserved for Native Tokens, or reserved for NFTs).
general.mintNativeTokenDescription: Mint native token following IRC30 standard
general.refreshTokenMetadataDescription: Reset and refresh all token metadata
general.refreshTokenMetadataHint: This will reset all your tokens' metadata including the verification status and unhide any hidden assets.
general.testDeepLinkDescription: Simulate a deep link request sent to firefly

dates.daysAgo: {time, plural, one {# dia} other {# dias}} atrás
dates.weeksAgo: {time, plural, one {# semana} other {# semanas}} atrás
dates.monthsAgo: {time, plural, one {# mês} other {# meses}} atrás
dates.yearsAgo: {time, plural, one {# ano} other {# anos}} atrás

notifications.updateError: Ocorreu um erro durante a atualização; por favor, tente novamente
notifications.minutesRemaining: {minutes, plural, one {# minute remaining} other {# minutes remaining}}
notifications.fundsAvailableSoon: Your funds will become available shortly

exportTransactionHistory.success: Transaction history for {accountAlias} was successfully saved to {filePath}
exportTransactionHistory.error: Unable to export transaction history for {accountAlias}

deepLinkingRequest.receivedWhileLoggedOut: Please login to initiate the deep link
deepLinkingRequest.invalidFormat: The deep link you followed is invalid
deepLinkingRequest.invalidAmount: The amount in deep link is not a number {amount}
deepLinkingRequest.invalidSurplus: The surplus in deep link is not a number {surplus}

send.success: Payment details added from deep link

notifications.syncing: Please wait until synchronization is finished to change wallets.
notifications.transferring: Please wait until all transactions are completed to change wallets.
notifications.participating: Please wait until all staking/voting transactions are completed to change wallets.

faucetRequest.success: Request for tokens sent to the faucet

refreshTokenMetadata.success: All token metadata has been reset and refreshed

restoreFromStrongholdBackup.wrongProtocol: Protocol doesn't match coin type found in Stronghold backup
restoreFromStrongholdBackup.wrongProtocolForClaiming: You must use an IOTA-based Stronghold backup to claim Shimmer rewards

findShimmerRewards.error: An error occurred while searching for rewards

claimShimmerRewards.error: An error occurred while claiming. Try again.

profile.length: Your profile name can't be longer than {length, plural, one {# character} other {# characters}}.
profile.duplicate: Já existe um perfil com este nome.

delete.nonEmptyAccounts: You must transfer all balances before you can delete your profile.

profile.type: Unable to determine the profile type
profile.setupType: Unable to determine the profile setup type

password.tooWeak: A sua nova palavra-passe é muito fraca.
password.row: Repetições de caracteres são fáceis de adivinhar.
password.pattern: Sequências curtas do teclado são fáceis de adivinhar.
password.names: Nomes e Sobrenomes são fáceis de adivinhar.
password.repeats: Repetições como 'aaa' são fáceis de adivinhar.
password.repeats2: Repetições como 'abcabcabc' são fáceis de adivinhar.
password.sequence: Sequências de caracteres são fáceis de adivinhar.
password.years: Anos recentes são fáceis de adivinhar.
password.common: Essa é uma senha muito comum.
password.similar: Essa palavra-passe é parecida com uma senha comum.
password.word: Uma única palavra é fácil de adivinhar.
password.length: Your password can't be longer than {length, plural, one {# character} other {# characters}}.

pincode.length: Your PIN must be {length, plural, one {# digit} other {# digits}} long.
pincode.incorrect: O seu PIN atual está incorreto.

account.length: Your wallet name can't be longer than {length, plural, one {# character} other {# characters}}.
account.empty: Deve usar a sua carteira mais recente antes de criar uma nova.
account.emptyName: A profile name must contain at least 1 character.
account.notEmpty: Deve transferir o seu saldo antes de apagar esta carteira.
account.duplicate: Uma carteira com esse nome já existe.
account.tilde: O nome do perfil não pode começar com o caractere '~'.
account.control: O nome do perfil não pode conter um caractere de controle.
account.startDot: O nome do perfil não pode começar com o caractere '.'.
account.chars: O nome do perfil não pode conter os seguintes caracteres <>:"/\|?*
account.index: Your account index must be a number between 0 and 2,147,483,647.
account.page: Your account page must be a number between 0 and 2,147,483,647.
account.syncing: There was an error syncing your wallets.
account.withBalance: You must transfer all balances before you can delete this wallet.
account.notLast: You can only delete your last wallet.

send.addressLength: Addresses should be {length, plural, one {# character} other {# characters}} long.
send.amountTooHigh: Isto é maior do que o seu saldo disponível.
send.amountNoFloat: Cannot use decimal places with the smallest unit selected
send.amountInvalidFormat: O valor parece ser um número inválido.
send.amountSmallerThanSubunit: The amount must be greater than the smallest subunit.
send.tagTooLong: The tag cannot be longer than 64 characters.
send.metadataTooLong: The metadata cannot be longer than 8192 characters.
send.amountZero: O valor deve ser maior que 0.
send.wrongAddressFormat: O endereço não está formatado corretamente.
send.unknownAsset: The asset is not known to this account.
send.insufficientFundsStorageDeposit: Insufficient funds to cover the storage deposit
send.noToAccount: Não selecionou uma carteira para enviar os fundos.
send.sendingDust: Não pode enviar menos de 1 Mi.
send.leavingDust: Não pode deixar menos do que 1 Mi no seu endereço.
send.transaction: There was an error sending your transaction. Please try again.
send.invalidExpirationDateTime: The chosen expiration date/time is invalid.
send.missingTransactionProgressEventPayload: The transaction progress event payload is missing

node.invalid: Por favor, insira uma URL válida.
node.dns: Could not find DNS resolution for node.
node.handshake: Could not complete handshake with node.
node.invalidCertificate: Could not connect with invalid certificate.
node.https: HTTPS is required; insecure connections over HTTP are not supported at this time.
node.timeNotSynced: Device time is incorrect, unable to sync node.
node.answer: Failed to get an answer from all nodes.
node.pluginNotAvailable: The "{nodePlugin}" plugin is not available on the current node.
node.unabledToConnect: Unable to connect to the node
node.differentNetwork: The node is located on a different network

network.mismatch: The network ID for this node is "{networkId}", which does not match the current network.
network.notReachable: The network ID for this node could not be retrieved, unable to add node.
network.badNodes: Unable to connect to the network with current node configuration.
network.nonEmptyAccount: You must transfer all balances before switching networks.

backup.invalid: O arquivo de backup não foi reconhecido.
backup.destination: O destino do backup não é válido.
backup.seedTooShort: The seed should be 81 characters long, it {length, plural, one {is #} other {is #}}
backup.seedCharacters: A seed deve conter apenas caracteres A-Z ou 9
backup.phraseWordCount: There should be 24 words in your recovery phrase, currently there {length, plural, one {is #} other {are #}}.
backup.phraseUnrecognizedWord: Palavra "{word}" não reconhecida na sua frase de recuperação
backup.unableToCopyFile: Unable to copy Stronghold backup file
backup.unableToRestoreForProfileManager: Unable to restore Stronghold backup for profile manager

ledger.appNotOpen: You must open the IOTA app on your Ledger device.
ledger.generic: There was an error connecting to your Ledger device.
ledger.legacyConnected: The wrong app is open on your Ledger device.
ledger.locked: Please unlock your Ledger device by entering the PIN.
ledger.mnemonicMismatch: You have connected the wrong Ledger device or the mnemonic has changed.
ledger.otherConnected: The wrong app is open on your Ledger device.
ledger.generateAddress: There was an error generating an address.
ledger.noStronghold: Unable to use Stronghold with Ledger profile.

popup.preventClose: This popup is unable to be closed.

migration.missingBundle: An error occurred while trying to find the transaction bundle.

crypto.cannotDecodeBech32: Unable to decode string as Bech32 address.

participation.cannotUseAccount: Unable to use the specified account.

shimmerClaiming.missingProfileManager: Unable to find Shimmer claiming profile manager
shimmerClaiming.cannotInitialiseAccount: Unable to initialize Shimmer claiming account
shimmerClaiming.missingAccount: Unable to find Shimmer claiming account

transaction.invalidExpirationDateTime: The chosen expiration date is invalid.

node.http: Using nodes over HTTP leaves traffic unencrypted and could pose a security risk.

participation.noFunds: You do not have any IOTA.

partiallyStakedFunds.title: New unstaked funds: {amount}
partiallyStakedFunds.preBody: You have received tokens that are not staked.
partiallyStakedFunds.body: You need to manually stake these new funds to receive airdrop rewards for them.

stakingMinRewards.title: Below minimum reward value
stakingMinRewards.bodyMinBalance: This wallet does not have enough IOTA tokens to reach the minimum airdrop reward and cannot therefore be staked.
stakingMinRewards.bodyBelowMin: This wallet has not reached the minimum reward value for {airdrop} ({airdropRewardMin}).
stakingMinRewards.bodyWillReachMin: You must stake for another {duration} to reach the minimum.
stakingMinRewards.bodyWillNotReachMin: You will not reach the minimum reward value during the remaining staking period unless you add more IOTA.
stakingMinRewards.bodyDidNotReachMin: You did not stake enough IOTA to reach the minimum reward value for {airdrop} ({airdropRewardMin}).
stakingMinRewards.bodyMinBalanceAirdrop: This wallet does not have enough IOTA tokens to reach the minimum airdrop reward for {airdrop}.

tooltips.optionalInput: This optional data will be public on the explorer and viewable by everyone.

incoming.storageDeposit: A refundable token deposit needed to store your transaction on the Tangle.
incoming.giftedStorageDeposit: The storage deposit for this transaction was gifted to you. You do not need to refund the deposit.
incoming.expirationTime: Claim these funds before the expiration time or they will be returned to the sender.
incoming.timelockDate: The sender set a timelock on these funds. You will be able to spend them once the timelock expires.
incoming.metadata: An optional data field for storing data persistently on the Tangle.
incoming.tag: A short optional data field. Tagging groups of transactions can make them easier to search for.

outgoing.storageDeposit: A storage deposit is a refundable deposit needed to store your transaction on the Tangle.
outgoing.giftedStorageDeposit: The recipient does not need to refund the deposit.
outgoing.expirationTime: If the recipient does not claim in time your tokens will be returned to you.
outgoing.timelockDate: You added a timelock to this transaction. The recipient will not be able to spend these funds until the timelock expires.
outgoing.metadata: An optional data field for storing data persistently on the Tangle.
outgoing.tag: A short optional data field. Tagging groups of transactions can make them easier to search for.

mintNativeTokenForm.decimals: IRC30 optional parameter: Number of decimals the token uses (divide the token amount by 10^decimals to get its user representation).
mintNativeTokenForm.description: IRC30 optional parameter: The human-readable description of the token.
mintNativeTokenForm.url: IRC30 optional parameter: URL pointing to more resources about the token like a website or social media page.
mintNativeTokenForm.logoUrl: IRC30 optional parameter: URL pointing to an image resource of the token logo.

developerProfileIndicator.warningText: You are currently using a developer profile and are connected to {networkName}

networkIndicator.warningText: Network performance degraded. Message confirmation may take a bit longer than usual.

camera.request: We need your permission to use your camera to be able to scan QR codes.
camera.requestInAppSettings: If you want to grant permission for using your camera to scan QR codes, please enable it in the app settings.
